verses.text: A Song of degrees for Solomon. Except the LORD shall build the house, they labor in vain that build it: except the LORD shall keep the city, the watchman waketh in vain.
\add It is\add* vain for you to rise early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: \add for\add* so he giveth his beloved sleep.
Lo, children \add are\add* a heritage of the LORD: \add and\add* the fruit of the womb \add is his\add* reward.
As arrows \add are\add* in the hand of a mighty man: so \add are\add* children of the youth.
Happy \add is\add* the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
